name: Kindergarten
description: The kindergarten program for children at least 5 years old by September 1st is full time and based on the standards put forth by the Department of Catholic Schools of the San Francisco Archdiocese. The guidelines follow California State Standards and are infused with Catholic teachings and traditions.
fullDescription: The kindergarten program for children at least 5 years old by September 1st is full time and based on the standards put forth by the Department of Catholic Schools of the San Francisco Archdiocese. The guidelines follow California State Standards and are infused with Catholic teachings and traditions.
whatTheyOffer: The kindergarten program for children at least 5 years old by September 1st is full time and based on the standards put forth by the Department of Catholic Schools of the San Francisco Archdiocese. The guidelines follow California State Standards and are infused with Catholic teachings and traditions.
howToGetIt: To begin, browse their website and see their social media pages. Visit a Campus Tour or Open House. Visit their admissions page to follow the steps for submitting an application.
cost: This is a fee based service.
